segments.text: hi , Mary ! What do you like to do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , I spend a lot of time watching movies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what a confidence ! I always watch a lot of movies , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh really , Frank ? What kind of movies do you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: actually , I watch whichever movie there is , be it a comedy , a sci-fi or a suspense movie . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: art films are my favorite , but thrillers are cool , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really impressive . These two genres are totally different .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure . I enjoy both of them very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how often do you go to the cinema ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: once in a while , I suppose , I usually rent movies at Movie Salon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's a movie rental store in my neighborhood . I've got a membership there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , you can find almost all new releases there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? Maybe I shall also sign up for its membership .
segments.speaker: S1
